shortDescription: SQL Injection exists in the PrayerCenter 3.0.2 component for Joomla! via the sessionid parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2008-6429.
vulnerabilityName: mlwebtechnologies prayercenter Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
